jobs.title: SAP BW consultant
jobs.description:
Hi ,

We are looking for consultants with experience on "SAP BW(French)" as a permanent role for one of our client based in Paris,France.

French & English language is required.

IF you are interested to apply ,kindly share your CV to plakshmi@jsanconsulting.com



Thank you & Regards,
Lakshmi
